hero.title: Contact {website.name}
hero.subtitle: Reach out to us with your questions, feedback, or ideas to enhance your {website.name} experience

contact.title: We're Here to Help
contact.description: The {website.name} team is dedicated to supporting our community of game creators. Whether you have a question about our tools, need technical support, or want to share your ideas, we're just an email away.

cta.title: Join Our Creative Community
cta.subtitle: Become part of {website.name} and start building your games while staying connected with our team.
